mapper.select: select a.rank1,a.rank2,a.rank3,a.rank4, b.rank1 - a.rank1 as rank1_rate, b.rank2 - a.rank2 as rank2_rate, b.rank3 - a.rank3 as rank3_rate, b.rank4 - a.rank4 as rank4_rate from idata2.tb_rank_log a left join idata2.tb_rank_log b on (a.author_id=b.author_id and a.book_id=b.book_id and a.batch_no -1 = b.batch_no) where a.author_id=#{authorId} and a.book_id=#{bookId} and a.batch_no=#{batchNo}

select ifnull((a.data_now-b.data_now),0) wordCnt, ifnull(round((a.data_now-b.data_now)/b.data_now*100,2),0) wordCntRate from idata2.tb_word_cnt_log a left join idata2.tb_word_cnt_log b on (a.author_id=b.author_id and a.book_id=b.book_id and a.batch_no -1 = b.batch_no) where a.author_id=#{authorId} and a.book_id=#{bookId} and a.batch_no=#{batchNo}

select a.update_book_cnt, b.update_book_cnt update_book_cnt2, a.author_cnt, b.author_cnt author_cnt2, a.chapter_cnt, b.chapter_cnt chapter_cnt2, a.new_book_cnt, b.new_book_cnt new_book_cnt2 from idata2.tb_all_gl a left join idata2.tb_all_gl b on(a.batch_no - 1=b.batch_no) where a.batch_no=#{batchNo}
